column2: brought to him out of the north by the [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]] during the [[War of the Ring]]
column3: and said to have been a gift from the lady [[Arwen|Arwen Evenstar]].<ref>{{RK|V2}}</ref>

column4: p. 97-8</ref> The first element in ''Ro(c)heryn'' is ''[[Horses#Names|roch]]'' ("horse")
